p: To date, no reports have been published on the utilization of the by-products of T. ferdinandiana and there is no investigation on the chemical and nutritional composition of T. ferdinandiana kernels. The aim of this study was to determine the potential use of the by-product of T. ferdinandiana in the industry by determining proximate, mineral and fatty acid compositions to ascertain its nutritional value and potential as a source of food supplement ingredients for the food industry.
